overview:
Brook is responsible for sourcing and managing new investments while supporting existing portfolio companies in Deutsche Telekom’s T-Mobile Venture Fund. As an investor focusing on mobile internet and digital media platforms, Brook brings a combination of operational and strategic advisory experience to the portfolio. He serves as a Board Observer with Medio Systems and Roamware.

+21 years of global experience in software and wireless services corporate, business and product development teams enable his contributions to entrepreneurs and investors.

2011 Panel participation:

National Venture Capital Association Corporate Venture Group Fall Summit: Global Investor Panel

Landmark Ventures Tel Aviv - Mobile Internet, Now and Future

Washington Technology Alliance Start-Up Screening Committee

UW Center for Technology & Entrepreneurship Start-Up business plan competition judge

2010 Panel participation: MobileBeat VC Forum, SD Forum Silicon Valley, Strickland Consulting CIO Forum

Specialties: Eco-system development, deal structure, product strategy, strategic investment planning and international business. Focused on mobile app discovery and internet software analytic platforms.
